eventParts.text: Hey, has anybirdy seen my pot? I swore I had it just now.
Your pot? You mean the one on your head?
Oh my beak, there it is!
Did you forget you had it on?
Yeah… sorry. I just got really worried for a second, thought I had lost it.
Yeah, my dad gave it to me. He’s got this really cool hat and when I was a kid I always wanted one of those myself. He gave the pot to me as a joke, to wear as a hat, but I’ve had it ever since.
Heh, yeah. I kinda miss him.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Don’t worry, Terry. We’ll get back home soon enough and then you can meet your dad. You just have to hang on for a little longer.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, I know. It just feels far away. 

Terry gains +2 solitude!

eventConsequence.selectionText: It’s alright if you miss your dad. We’ll make sure you hang onto your pot until you meet him again!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thanks! You guys are the best. 

Terry gains +2 social!
